interpolate-colors: Take a look at local EECS 111 local racket documentation about interpolate-colors

recursion: Take a look at EECS 111 Videos - Recursion I

alpha: Take a careful look at Exercise Interlude: Representing colors with RGB(A)
rounded: Try to search why it is rounded (not rounded).
Instead of using quotient function, use '/'.
